title: Cant even download the game -_-
body: Went to play league and my patcher got stuck at 99 for two hours. Reinstalled and then the patcher gets stuck at 36%, I restart league of legends and then it doesnt open again untill I reinstall LoL, which then it just repeats, getting stuck at 36% and then not opening again if it try to reopen the patch

replies.body: Have you tried running the client repair? And if that doesn't work you may have to uninstall it all the way off of your computer and reinstall.
